response.overview: Minnie chooses to run the three-legged race with Daisy which forces Mickey to join Pete's team. Along the way Mickey struggles with the fact that everyone in the race is cheating to try and win.Minnie chooses to run the three-legged race with Daisy which forces Mickey to join Pete's team. response.title: Three-Legged Race
